author: norman
msg: Replace MessageMapper.save(..) with MessageMapper.add(..) and MessageMapper.updateFlags(..). See MAILBOX-17

author: jonathan
msg: Now all tools in this directory use optparse for their command lines, rather than a variety of different approaches. Simplifies option handling significantly.
Doesn't simplify arguments list in qpid-route and qpid-config.

author: zoe
msg: ARIES-502 Adding image file sto site

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Anne Jessel "Is Empty for text-find widget broken" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4025) - OFBIZ-4025
* go to Facility, Inventory Items tab (or any form that uses text-find widget)
* choose "Is Empty" from drop-down next to Product Id
Expected behaviour: no matching items listed, as all items have a Product Id.
Problem is caused by find code assuming that there is no entity condition to be created if the text field is empty, but of course Is Empty is
different to the other operators in that the text field is expected to be empty.
The attached patch adds a special check for the Is Empty operator.
